name: 2 Great Games!: Pac-Man World + Ms. Pac-Man: Maze Madness
overview: Pac-Man World and Maze Madness takes the classic arcade action to a whole new level. Pac-Man has landed on Ghost Island with a mission - spoil Toc-Man's party in this new 3D Pac-World. Ms. Pac-Man - Maze Madness lets you take Ms. Pac-Man on a tour of Pac-World, as snacks on all the pellets she can find. Help her retrieve the four Gems of Virtue!
